definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence
Hall of Great Strength, main hall of a Buddhist temple containing the main image of veneration 大雄[da4 xiong2]

sentences.english: The Bell Tower in Xi'an was not only built earlier, but also taller than any other in the country.
sentences.chinese: 因而西安的钟楼不但修的早，而且也修得高大雄伟。

sentences.english: Male was giambi chasing back home.
sentences.chinese: 大雄被技安追着回到家。

sentences.english: Tall majestic monastery, with the typical architectural style of the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 该寺高大雄伟，具有典型的明代建筑风格。

sentences.english: Nobita is a fourth grader in Tokyo and an only child of the family.
sentences.chinese: 大雄是个东京的小学四年级生，以及家里的独生子。

sentences.english: It stands in the Yellow Sea lake, tall and majestic.
sentences.chinese: 它耸立在黄海之滨，高大雄伟。

sentences.english: Male came walking technology area, happened to spent sleep.
sentences.chinese: 大雄走着走着走到了空地，恰巧技安睡呆了。

sentences.english: The midway of funicular at Chi-Nan Temple, Mu-Cha, Taipei.

sentences.english: The arrival point of funicular track at Chi-Nan Temple, Mu-Cha, Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 木栅指南宫旁大雄宝殿山下的索道台车之著点。

sentences.english: On one side of Main Hall is Kwun Yum Hall.
sentences.chinese: 在大雄殿左边的观音殿。

sentences.english: Oh, It must be very smart Nobita.
sentences.chinese: 哦，那一定会是非常聪明的大雄。

sentences.english: There was a big buck rabbit sitting calmly among the lettuces.
sentences.chinese: 一只大雄兔安静地蹲在莴苣中。

sentences.english: On one side of Main Hall is Medicine Hall .
sentences.chinese: 在大雄殿右边的药师殿。

sentences.english: Supposes the sound thorough room hall in the Sakyamuni valuable palace east side, named kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 在大雄宝殿东侧设有素斋馆，名为香积厨。

sentences.english: This chapter is talk about Nobita Nobi and Shizuka Minamoto's childhood.
sentences.chinese: 本章是关于大雄与宜静童年的相识。

sentences.english: Yesterday, we visited Daxiong temple hall of Shaolin Temple.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我们参观了少林寺的大雄宝殿。

sentences.english: And let us build a tower, so great and tall that its top will touch the skies.
sentences.chinese: 而且还要造一座高大雄伟的塔，直达天际。
